import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { ChangeDetectionStrategy, Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-basic-page', templateUrl: './basic-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./basic-page.component.css'], changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush, }) export class BasicPageComponent { public myForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ name : new FormControl('', [],[]), price: new FormControl(0, [],[]), inStorage : new FormControl(0, [],[]), }); }
